column4: is there a simple/quick way to convert to cmdline-only bootup?
install sysv-rc-conf and remove gdm for RunLevel 2
thus, after booting, you end up on the console. init 3 will further boot up to gnome
is there anything other than gdm that needs to get cut out of RL2? if not i can just do that by hand
that would prevent gdm from start. i think, this is what you wanted.
